      • handleClaimMapping

        public static Map<String,String> handleClaimMapping(org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.model.IdentityProvider identityProvider,
                                                    Map<String,String> attributes,
                                                    String tenantDomain,
                                                    OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokenReqMsgCtx)
                                             throws org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException,
                                                    org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.IdentityApplicationManagementException
        Handle claims from identity provider based on claim configurations.
        Parameters:
        identityProvider - Identity Provider
        attributes - Relevant Claims coming from IDP
        tenantDomain - Tenant Domain.
        tokenReqMsgCtx - Token request message context.
        Returns:
        mapped local claims.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Identity Oauth2 Exception.
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.IdentityApplicationManagementException
